Access to the {{< var validmind_platform >}} is associated with an organization, which encompasses all your users, groups, and business units. As a user, you can belong to multiple organizations.

<!-- ## Prerequisites -->

## Switch between organizations
::: {.callout}
You will only see the option to switch between organizations if you belong to more than one organization.
:::

1. [Log into the {{< var validmind_platform >}}](/guide/log-into-validmind.qmd).

2. Click **{{< fa gear >}} Settings**. 

3. Under Workplace Settings, select **Organization**.

4. Under **Organization**, select the organization you'd like to switch to.

    - Once selected, this will become your active organization. 
    - Your active organization is displayed under your name and roles in the left sidebar as Active org.

## Change organization name

::: {.callout}
To change your organization's name, you must hold the Customer Admin role.[^1]
:::

1. [Log into the {{< var validmind_platform >}}](/guide/log-into-validmind.qmd).

2. Click **{{< fa gear >}} Settings**. 

3. Under Workplace Settings, select **Organization**.

4. Under **Organization name**, type in your new name and click **Update** to save your changes.
